price: Ya ce: "Abin sani kawai, inã kai ƙarar baƙin cikĩna da sunõna zuwa ga Allah, kuma na san abin da ba ku sani ba daga Allah."
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَشۡكُواْ بَثِّي وَحُزۡنِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā ashkū bathī waḥuz'nī ilā al-lahi wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
